chinese: 知识就是力量。
english: Knowledge is power.

chinese: 生活就像一盒巧克力，你永远不知道下一颗是什么味道。
english: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

chinese: 成功不是终点，失败不是末日，重要的是继续前进的勇气。
english: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

chinese: 想象力比知识更重要。
english: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

chinese: 不要问国家能为你做什么，而要问你能为国家做什么。
english: Ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country.

chinese: 教育是改变世界最强大的武器。
english: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

chinese: 如果你想要别人尊重你，首先要尊重自己。
english: If you want to be respected, you have to respect yourself first.

chinese: 梦想不会自动实现，但如果你不努力，它们永远不会实现。
english: Dreams don't work unless you do.

chinese: 成功的关键在于从失败中学习。
english: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.

chinese: 创新是区分领导者和追随者的关键。
english: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

chinese: 时间就是金钱。
english: Time is money.

chinese: 行动胜于雄辩。
english: Well done is better than well said.

chinese: 如果你能梦想，你就能实现。
english: If you can dream it, you can do it.

chinese: 永远不要放弃，永远不要放弃，永远不要放弃。
english: Never, never, never give up.

chinese: 生活不是等待暴风雨过去，而是学会在雨中跳舞。
english: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, it's about learning to dance in the rain.

chinese: 成功是99%的汗水和1%的灵感。
english: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

chinese: 如果你想要成功，就要敢于失败。
english: If you want to succeed, you have to be willing to fail.

chinese: 机会只青睐有准备的人。
english: Chance favors the prepared mind.

chinese: 不要害怕完美，因为你永远达不到它。
english: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.

chinese: 生活就像骑自行车，要保持平衡，就必须不断前进。
english: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
